metadata.title: CVE-2020-27661 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A divide-by-zero issue was found in dwc2_handle_packet in hw/usb/hcd-dwc2.cin the hcd-dwc2 USB host controller emulation of QEMU. A malicious guestcould use this flaw to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in adenial of service.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
